meanings.definition: A small stalk attaching the leaflet of a compound leaf to the main stem.
meanings.sent1: The petiolule connects the leaflet to the main stem.
meanings.sent2: She carefully observed the petiolule of the leaflet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the petiolule as a tiny swing.
meanings.sent4: Like a bridge, the petiolule linked the leaflet to the main stem.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petiolule resembled a slender thread holding the leaflet in place.
